title: myTuner Radio Pro
summary: More than 40000 radio stations available in 200 countries!
developer: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
description: *** NO ADS - LIVE RADIO BROADCASTS ***More than 40,000 radio stations and 200 countries and territories available in our application, from sports to news and music and many others to choose from. More than 1.000.000 Podcasts to listen for free with rankings per country.myTuner Radio is the best way to listen to the internet radio on your Android device. RANKINGS- Number 1 in 55 Countries.- TOP 5  in 87 Countries.- TOP 100 in 126 Countries.- Four stars Rating Average Now you can listen the best internet radio stations of your country or of your homeland when you are abroad.  With myTuner Radio you can: - Listen to the best internet radios stations;- Radios from more than 200 countries; - Listen to over 40,000 radio stations;- More than 1.000.000 Podcasts with rankings per country;- Share using Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email; - Add more radios to your favorites list; - Search  by country, by genre, by format, by city;- Listen to the radios in the background; There may be some stations that do not work because their stream is offline.This application is optimized for 3G networks and Wi-Fi.myTuner Radio gives you the best experience in what comes to listening to worldwide radios stations.More information at www.mytuner-radio.com
descriptionHTML:
*** NO ADS - LIVE RADIO BROADCASTS ***

More than 40,000 radio stations and 200 countries and territories available in our application, from sports to news and music and many others to choose from.
More than 1.000.000 Podcasts to listen for free with rankings per country.

myTuner Radio is the best way to listen to the internet radio on your Android device.


RANKINGS
- Number 1 in 55 Countries.
- TOP 5 in 87 Countries.
- TOP 100 in 126 Countries.
- Four stars Rating Average


Now you can listen the best internet radio stations of your country or of your homeland when you are abroad.


With myTuner Radio you can:
- Listen to the best internet radios stations;
- Radios from more than 200 countries;
- Listen to over 40,000 radio stations;
- More than 1.000.000 Podcasts with rankings per country;
- Share using Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email;
- Add more radios to your favorites list;
- Search by country, by genre, by format, by city;
- Listen to the radios in the background;


There may be some stations that do not work because their stream is offline.This application is optimized for 3G networks and Wi-Fi.

myTuner Radio gives you the best experience in what comes to listening to worldwide radios stations.

More information at www.mytuner-radio.com
comments: I have one problem with this otherwise great app: even if I shut it down completely, it starts out of the blue after I get a text msg or call. It can be very unsettling late at night to have an app blast music just because I get a message. Great selection of stations. Very few, if any, dead links.
Selecting a country is not working. Pressing the three dots in the upper right hand corner does nothing to help this.
No matter if I'm on Wi-Fi, or 4G the station always stops playing. Not to buffer or load, just stops. Can't figure out why as it happens for all stations I listen to.

Please fix cellular network issue !! All stations stop work after 5 minutes when screen off in cellular network connection !!! In WiFi connection its OK ! Please  fix this issue in next update !! And I put the app in not optimize battery list ... I allow the app to work in background but same issue happened !!! My phone nexus5 Android 7.1 and nexus 9 android 7.2 the same issue ... Please fix !!!!!!
I pay for the pro version and is unusable with android auto. I need to use the free one with payed for remove comercials. So I expect from vendor to fix issue or retun the money.

Canceling my short review.  Tonight this app decided to be my Musical Alarm Clock: --I have not been using this app --I have never told it to wake me up --It decided 3am was my wakeup time.  The app is now uninstalled: You can't fix stupid.   as Ron would say.
